common.framework.dsb.client

接口 ServiceFactory

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DefaultServiceFactory

    public interface ServiceFactory
    作者:
    David Yuan

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int DSB_HA_CALL 
      static java.lang.String DSB_HA_SERVER 
      static int DSB_LOCAL_CALL 
      static int DSB_REMOTE_CALL 
      static java.lang.String DSB_SOCKET_TIMEOUT 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ServiceProxy _lookup_ha()
      Lookup remote service proxy with high availability (HA), before calling this method, dsb.ha.server must be configured into system properties.
      ServiceProxy _lookup_ha(java.lang.String haName)
      Lookup remote service proxy with high availability (HA) by using given HA name, before calling this method, HA name must be configured into system properties. example: -Ddsb.ha.1=192.168.1.2:10000,192.168.1.3:10000
      ServiceProxy _lookup()
      Lookup local service proxy.
      ServiceProxy _lookup(java.lang.String host, int port)
      Lookup remote service proxy.
      boolean closeService(java.lang.String serviceName)
      Close service with the specified name in the local server.
      void installService(java.lang.String jarPath, java.lang.String host, int port)
      Install dynamic service to remote server
      java.util.List<ServiceDescriptor> list()
      List all available dynamic service in the local server.
      java.util.List<ServiceDescriptor> list(java.lang.String host, int port)
      List all available dynamic service in the specified server
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> listStartedService()
      List all started services in the local server.
      <T extends DynamicService> 
      T      		 lookup_ha(java.lang.String serviceName)
      Lookup remote service bean with high availability (HA) by using default HA name (dsb.ha.server), before calling this method, HA name (dsb.ha.server) must be configured into system properties. example: -Ddsb.ha.server=192.168.1.2:10000,192.168.1.3:10000
      <T extends DynamicService> 
      T      		 lookup_ha(java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String haName)
      Lookup remote service bean with high availability (HA) from given haName.
      <T extends DynamicService> 
      T      		 lookup(java.lang.String serviceName)
      Lookup local dynamic service
      <T extends DynamicService> 
      T      		 lookup(java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String host, int port)
      Lookup remote dynamic service.
      boolean refreshService(java.lang.String servieName)
      Refresh service with the specified name in the local server.
      boolean startService(java.lang.String serviceName)
      Start service with the specified name in the local server.

    • 方法详细资料

      • lookup

        <T extends DynamicService> T lookup(java.lang.String serviceName)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Lookup local dynamic service
        参数:
        serviceName - the name of local dynamic service
        返回:
        the instance of local dynamic service
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - when failed to lookup dynamic service

      • lookup

        <T extends DynamicService> T lookup(java.lang.String serviceName,
                                  java.lang.String host,
                                  int port)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Lookup remote dynamic service.
        参数:
        serviceName - the name of dynamic service
        host - the host address of dynamic service
        port - the port of dynamic service
        返回:
        the instance of remote dynamic service
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - when failed to lookup dynamic service

      • lookup_ha

        <T extends DynamicService> T lookup_ha(java.lang.String serviceName)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Lookup remote service bean with high availability (HA) by using default HA name (dsb.ha.server), before calling this method, HA name (dsb.ha.server) must be configured into system properties. example: -Ddsb.ha.server=192.168.1.2:10000,192.168.1.3:10000
        参数:
        serviceName -
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • lookup_ha

        <T extends DynamicService> T lookup_ha(java.lang.String serviceName,
                                     java.lang.String haName)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Lookup remote service bean with high availability (HA) from given haName. example: -Ddsb.ha.1=192.168.1.2:10000,192.168.1.3:10000
        参数:
        serviceName -
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
